column1: Text
hey, you sent out a message for a writer ?
hey, thanks a lot for the help . i need a writer to help me on the 8th, 10th and the 11th
what time ?
they'll be at 5:45pm at ab5, mit
oh okay . give me a minute . hey, i'll do it:)
brilliant ! . thank you so much
not a problem !
hi i'm jenit
oh yes . hi, i'm astha .
haha . i'll text you tomorrow for few details that i have to submit at my college
okay:) . also, listen, my handwriting isn't the best . will that be a problem for you ?
definitely better than my left hand handwriting so i'm fine haha
lol okay then
would you like to study half my portion ?
hell no . if you want, i can give it a read max lol
this is going to be me too
ops
i myself don't understand much
don't they allow you to give the exam later if you miss it ? ?
plus there's some disgusting math so i guess that's something to look forward to .
crap
i missed it a week back . this is the "later"
ok a few disclaimers . 1 .i suck at maths
i feel you're stressing about my exams more than me . i'll pass, don't worry . i have accepted the mediocre gpa life
lol okayy . understandable
hey morning !
hey !
i have to submit your information to the associate director so can you please send me your reg id, year and section
you don't need my college ?
would be kind of stupid of me to ask you your college when i know that siddhi put it up on a soc group haha
well now i didn't have that piece of information, you see . one hundred and eighty million, seven hundred and one thousand and thirty-four
anyway, there's always facebook
hey . morning !
hey, morning ! . tf is this
these are two things that they will definitely ask . dw, don't need to remember anything . just read it so that you're not completely clueless about the words haha
okayy
let's meet by 5:30 outside ab5 ?
yes okay . do i need to get any identity proof ?
yes please . you live in the hostel right ?
yes
alright then just walk straight from kc and i'll meet you at the nearest gate from there
haan that staircase na ?
yep next to the architecture block
yes, okayy
see you !
where are you ?
outside three hundred and ten in ab5 . just come inside and come one floor up
okayy
trust me, you were brilliant . thank you so much .
yay thanks . how did your exam go ?
first good paper of the semester tbh
yay . heyy . i have a question
hello . sup
is it okay if someone else comes to write your paper or does it have to be me ? i'll find someone, you won't have to worry about the search . the play is on friday and we have a sudden crisis .
arre batao . if there's no way out, i'll come
if you can find someone and get me their info before tomorrows paper it should be fine
don't worry . thank you
make sure they are as fast as you
and, i'm so, so sorry . i know this is abrupt . hahaa
what happened tho
so my part was done, but since there are less people . they put me in the end scene . and . there's a change of costume . so the team has to go to udupi and all
shit . let's hope everything works out
i hope so too . she's writing your paper
thank you so much . and all the best for your play :)
thank you
is she there on whatsapp ? can't find her
oh haan . here's her whatsapp number
thank god . haha thanks
. all the besstt
thanks
hey, how was it ?
hey . it was alright . we both were pretty clueless during the paper so
all the best for today
thank youu
